welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Fairfield, where small town charm meets big city amenities. Known for its stunning parks, historic downtown, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport offers domestic flights to various destinations within the United States.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Napa County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
